description:
suffixarray: generate less garbage during construction

Minorly improves runtime by about 2-3%

messages.text:
I've been using one for internal testing, but I guess I could just submit
it. Cl incoming.

-Eric

On Sep 18, 2011 1:58 PM, "Jeff Hodges" <jeff@somethingsimilar.com> wrote:
> A related benchmark might be great. Have I missed one already written?
>
> On Sun, Sep 18, 2011 at 1:00 AM, <eric.d.eisner@gmail.com> wrote:
>> Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>>
>> Please take another look.
>>
>>
>> http://codereview.appspot.com/5052045/
>>

LGTM

Unless I hear otherwise, I'll wait with submitting this until you've added the benchmark. Then you can mention the improvement in the CL.

Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

A related benchmark might be great. Have I missed one already written?

On Sun, Sep 18, 2011 at 1:00 AM,  <eric.d.eisner@gmail.com> wrote:
> Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> Please take another look.
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5052045/
>
